name: Smartwool Ski Racer Socks - Children to Youths
description: Serious speed calls for serious footwear. Made with a cozy, long-lasting blend of merino wool and nylon, the Ski Racer Socks keep you comfortable through long days of ripping. Cushioning in the shin and forefoot as well as a flat toe seam make them ideal for either ski or snowboard boots.Merino and nylon fabric blend is warm, durable and resists odours.Light cushioning on shin and forefoot are comfortable inside ski boots.Flat-knit toe seam.
